thread.title: Drudge Rips the Oscars As ‘Most Politically-Drenched Night’ in Hollywood’s History
thread.title_full: Drudge Rips the Oscars As ‘Most Politically-Drenched Night’ in Hollywood’s History

author: Ken Meyer
title: Drudge Rips the Oscars As ‘Most Politically-Drenched Night’ in Hollywood’s History
text:
Drudge Rips the Oscars As ‘Most Politically-Drenched Night’ in Hollywood’s History by Ken Meyer | 10:45   
Matt Drudge is not impressed with tonight’s Academy Award show, and he offered a rare tweet to make sure everyone knows what he thinks. 
Shortly after Jimmy Kimmel launched his monologue full of jokes about President Trump , the Drudge Report put up a banner to reflect the immediate political tone of the night: IDK but I think @Drudge might’ve written his headlines before the Academy Awards even started pic.twitter.com/CWjvFG4gkO 
— Brian Stelter (@brianstelter) February 27, 2017 
As the night proceeded to include more references to politics , the media, and various related subject, Drudge emerged on Twitter to directly pan the entire evening: 
[Image via screengrab]
